channel.description: Week 11 Announcements This Week Lab 5 Due Discussion 3 Next Week Lab 6 Quizzes Next Week Lab 6 Following Week Lab 5 Grading SSH to Frontend SSH to Backend Firewall, Date/Time Apache, DNS, HTTPS Docker Reverse Proxy Lab 6 File Servers Drive Mappings Application Servers Working Web Apps Final Project Build Something or Fix Something Web Resource for New Startup Set up Laptops for a School Design Central Auth for Company Thin Clients vs.
